# flashcrash

Retrieve a random chart from the [Animal Spirits](https://podcasts.thecompoundnews.com/show/animalspirits/) podcast. *Not affiliated with Animal Spirits, Michael Batnick, Ben Carlson, or Ritholtz Wealth Management in any form.* Just something made for fun and out of love for the podcast.
